headline: Will Pentair (PNR) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Pentair (PNR) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: Pentair Gears Up to Report Q1 Earnings: What to Expect From the Stock?
summary: PNR's Q1 results are likely to reflect gains from pricing actions and its transformation program, offset by lower volumes in the Water and Flow segments.

headline: Making Better Essential: Pentair Releases 2024 Sustainability Report
